    • 方法详细资料

      • isLoading

        public boolean isLoading()

      • func_177570_a

        public <any> func_177570_a()

      • getInventoryVariant

        public static ModelResourceLocation getInventoryVariant(java.lang.String s)
        Hooked from ModelBakery, allows using MRLs that don't end with "inventory" for items.

      • onPostBakeEvent

        public void onPostBakeEvent(<any> modelRegistry)
        Internal, do not use.

      • setCustomStateMapper

        public static void setCustomStateMapper(Block block,
                                        IStateMapper mapper)
        Adds a custom IBlockState -> model variant logic.

      • onRegisterAllBlocks

        public static void onRegisterAllBlocks(BlockModelShapes shapes)
        Internal, do not use.

      • setCustomModelResourceLocation

        public static void setCustomModelResourceLocation(Item item,
                                                  int metadata,
                                                  ModelResourceLocation model)
        Adds a simple mapping from Item + metadata to the model variant. Registers the variant with the ModelBakery too.

      • setCustomMeshDefinition

        public static void setCustomMeshDefinition(Item item,
                                           ItemMeshDefinition meshDefinition)
        Adds generic ItemStack -> model variant logic. You still need to manually call ModelBakery.registerItemVariants with all values that meshDefinition can return.

      • setBucketModelDefinition

        public static void setBucketModelDefinition(Item item)
        Helper method for registering all itemstacks for given item to map to universal bucket model.

      • onRegisterItems

        public static void onRegisterItems(ItemModelMesher mesher)
        Internal, do not use.

      • defaultTextureGetter

        public static java.util.function.Function<ResourceLocation,TextureAtlasSprite> defaultTextureGetter()
        Get the default texture getter the models will be baked with.
